title: Pocket Pedals convert clipless to flats tool-free for casual journeys about town
content:
Do you have just one bike in the stable that you use for everything from the mid-week evening time trial, to the unofficial club road race at the weekend, to razzing about town on errands? If so, it’s likely you’ve been frustrated heading out on the latter type of ride for one of two possible

The post Pocket Pedals convert clipless to flats tool-free for casual journeys about town appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
